title: Exiles Ultimate Collection Book 6 (2010) #1
description:
Six strangers, each an X-Man from a different reality—brought together to ensure that life as we know it doesn’t cease to exist! They have become unhinged from time. They are heroes from different realities whose own timelines have become compromised. The lives they once knew are gone. To return to their worlds, they must travel together from one alternate universe to another, each time completing a mission to set right what went wrong. They have found love, experienced danger and formed friendships. Their lives are unpredictable. No one can say where their next mission will take them. They are the Exiles, and this is their fate. Now,
relive their quest to fix the kinks in the chains of reality, collected across six titanic trade paperbacks! Collecting EXILES #90-100, DAYS OF THEN & NOW and X-MEN: DIE BY THE SWORD #1-5.
432 PGS./Rated A …$34.99  ISBN: 978-0-7851-3892-1
